titleStmt.title: The vvild vine: or, An exposition on Isaiah's parabolicall song of the beloued: Isa. 5. 1,2,3, &c. By Nehemiah Rogers, pastor of Messing in Essex
Strange vineyard in Palæstina
titleStmt.author: Rogers, Nehemiah, 1593-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Haviland and G. Miller] for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Bible, at the great north doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with cancel title page printed by G. Miller (STC), of: A strange vineyard in Palæstina.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Bible, at the great north doore of Pauls
